bio.about: I love designing systems and diving deep into challenges to solve problems. I have more than 5 years of experience in web applications. I am recently working with PHP & python language. I have experience in software development life cycle phases, including Design, Development, Business Analysis/Modeling, and Maintain. Tdd is something I recently went to.

experiences.description: BarOn transportation system has provided a platform so that businesses can easily communicate with an ambassador. I'm responsible for troubleshooting, debugging and upgrading existing software and external projects, training, and mentoring backend team members.

Basalam is a large-scale startup. I'm responsible for solving business requirements with SLAs by developing new futures and improving the scaling or availability of systems. I developed Story, ADS, order processing, survey, and product variation systems.
I often work with back-end developers and DevOps engineers in platform teams.
Pasargad is a wireless network provider. I designed and developed multi websites with PHP and Magento CMS. I also developed one windows application for network issue tracking.

NADCo produces educational toys and robots with computer interfaces and offers formal hands-on courses based on its educational kits for different ages. I was teach the foundations of robotics, algorithmic thinking, and programming concepts to students and was a Referee in competitions.

projects.name: TARAZ
projects.description: An application for training and testing the textile design techniques.
